name: cat in a hat christmas bauble
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
cute crochet christmas cat pattern  
this pattern is designed as a christmas bauble but can be used as an ornament also. the hat is removable so can still be used once the holiday season is over! all you need is approx 60 minutes and a few materials. 

this pattern is completely free on my [website][1]! if you prefer a more detailed and printable pdf version, you can purchase this on [etsy][2].

this kitty is 10cm wide x 7cm long with a 2.5mm hook and 4 ply cotton yarn. you can make this item larger or smaller by changing the hook size and yarn width. although the pattern uses the colours white, orange and red, you can use any colour scheme you like. if you are not confident with changing yarn, you can choose one colour to use for the entire project. 

this pattern is beginner friendly and written in us crochet terms. the only sewing used is for the facial features, the cat itself requires no sewing.

**gauge:** 23 stitches by 25 rows = 4 inches (10cm)

**abbreviations**

ch - chain stitch    
sc - single crochet
dec - decrease 
inc - increase
mc - magic circle
sl st - slip stitch 
rnd - round
flo - front loops only
(sc, inc) x2 - complete stitches inside brackets the indicated number of times

**materials**

2.5mm crochet hook
approx 20g 4 ply white yarn
approx 20g 4 ply orange yarn
small amount of red yarn
stitch marker
3mm safety eyes
black thread
sewing needle
tapestry needle 
filling 
scissors
